                          edu.umaryland.igs.idea.DatasetVerifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
abstract class DatasetVerifier
extends OmegaBasedFilenameLengthLimiter

A dataset list's constituent sequence and tree filenames are validated by instances of anonymous subclasses of class DatasetVerifier, which extends OmegaBasedFilenameLengthLimiter. The anonymous subclasses define maxAbsolutePathLength and maxRelativePathLength according to their individual needs but share DatasetVerifier's implementation of relativeTo. The dataset list filename is required as a parameter to the constructor because its parent directory is used as the assumed parent for sequence and tree filenames given as relative paths if no input directory is currently set.

Field Detail

datasetListName

protected String datasetListName
Constructor Detail

DatasetVerifier

public DatasetVerifier(String datasetListName,
                       IDEAConfiguration config)
In DatasetVerifier, a two-arg constructor replaces the one-arg constructor of StateDependentInputVerifier because the most recently chosen dataset list filename is required and, since it has not yet been validated, it is not available via currentState.

Parameters:
datasetListName - the name of a dataset list file listing filenames on which this verifier operates
config - the state on which to base validation
Method Detail

relativeTo

public String relativeTo()
The relativeTo method is declared by FileVerifier. DatasetVerifier's implementation returns the current value of the "Input directory" parameter, if it is not the empty string, or otherwise the directory containing or assumed to contain the dataset list file, if the value of the "Dataset name list" parameter is not the empty string, or otherwise the directory from which IDEA was invoked.

Specified by:
relativeTo in class FileVerifier
Returns:
in order of preference, the input directory, the dataset list's parent directory or the invocation directory
